证据片段: Specimens were prepared from recrystallized and from 50 percent coldworked Zircaloy-2 sheet of 0.50–mm thickness

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The oxygen content of the sheet material was 800 ppm

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: 50% cold-worked RT 0.2% 620 MPa

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: 50% cold-worked 573K 0.2% 430 MPa

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: Recrystallized RT 0.2% 315 MPa

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: Recrystallized 573K 0.2% 130 MPa

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: When fracture of the discs could not be detected within $1 8 ~ \mathbf { k } \mathbf { s }$ , the tests were terminated

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: For iodine levels below $1 \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { c m } ^ { 2 }$ (about $0 . 2 ~ \mathrm { m g / \Omega }$ $\mathsf { c m } ^ { 3 } )$ and forces below $3 0 0 ~ \mathrm { { N } }$ only very small cracks could be observed in 50 percent cold-worked material after $1 8 \ \mathbf { k } \mathbf { s } .$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: In the absence of iodine, coldworked material showed through-cracks only when the bending force exceeded $3 0 0 \textbf { N }$ within $1 8 \ \mathbf { k } \mathbf { s }$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: Recrystallized material cracked within $1 8 ~ \mathbf { k } \mathbf { s }$ only if the bending force was over $\bf { 2 5 0 N }$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: the maximum time to fracture was $4 . 5 \mathrm { \bf k s }$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: No influence of the amount of iodine on the time to rupture was observed, neither for the cleaned nor for the pickled state of the surface of the 50 percent coldworked material

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: The amount of iodine for the stressed slotted rings was varied from $2 \mathrm { m } \mathbf { g } / \AA$ $\mathsf { c m } ^ { 2 } ( 0 . 4 \mathrm { m g } / \mathsf { c m } ^ { 3 } )$ to $2 0 ~ \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { c m } ^ { 2 }$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: The stresses, as calculated by Eq 1, were 80, 95, and 100 percent of the 0.2 proof stress at $\$ 73\ 8$ for the particular type of tube.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: After being held at a temperature of $5 7 3 \mathrm { ~ K ~ }$ for $3 6 0 ~ \mathbf { k } \mathbf { s }$ none of the stressed, slotted rings cracked.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: An extra batch of stressed rings of Material C was encapsulated with ${ \textbf { l g } }$ of steel wool, as Wood suggests, but no cracking occurred.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: The iron added did not have any influence during $3 6 0 ~ \mathbf { k } \thinspace \mathbf { s }$ tests.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: Additional tests performed in capsules filled with helium showed local chemical attack of Zircaloy-2, when more than $3 \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { c m } ^ { 2 }$ iodine was present.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: The morphology of the cracks resembles the stringers of precipitated zirconium hydride when the hydrogen content of the material exceeds $2 0 0 \ p \mathsf { p m }$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: The fact that the batches of Zircaloy-2 tubing did not show any stress corrosion cracking, when stressed to the 0.2 percent proof stress

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: Wood has shown, residual stresses are an important factor in the susceptibility of Zircaloy to iodine cracking at $\$ 73$

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: A threshold value of about $2 \mathrm { \ m g / c m ^ { 2 } \ ( 0 . 4 \mathrm { \ m g / \Omega } }$ $\mathsf { c m } ^ { 3 } ,$ must be exceeded before fast fracture occurs.

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: Fast iodine stress corrosion cracking by biaxial bending has been observed to occur with decreasing bending force in the temperature range of 463 K to 773 K, for initial iodine amounts of $2 5 \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { c m } ^ { 2 }$ .

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: Uniaxially stressed creep specimens of cold-worked Zircaloy sheet were found not to be susceptible to fast iodine stress corrosion for initial amounts of iodine up to $2 0 0 \mathrm { m } \mathbf { g } / \mathsf { c m } ^ { 2 }$ .

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk4
证据片段: No stress corrosion could be observed within $3 6 0 ~ \mathbf { k } \thinspace \mathbf { s }$ in stressed slotted rings made of three different batches of Zircaloy-2 tubing that was exposed to atmospheres with an initial amount of iodine of up to $2 0 0 \mathrm { m g } / \mathrm { c m } ^ { 2 }$ .

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk5
证据片段: The principal corrosion parameters were: alloy composition (Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-4, $Z _ { \mathsf { r } - 2 } \mathsf { s N b }$ , and crystal bar zirconium)

文献ID: STP551-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_2nd Volume_040_chunk5
证据片段: Thick prefilms tended to suppress accelerated corrosion in the oxygenated system
